attributes.review: I downloaded this app for the purpose of downloading it and boy was I surprised. Something crazy happened.. I could sense myself getting stupider and stupider the longer it sat untouched on my phone! I’ve since deleted it but it’s too late. I have to restart high school. Very disappointed but not surprised.
attributes.title: Oh god

attributes.review: i was horrified when i first opened the app to see a cheeto on the front cover, didn’t really appreciate that tbh, then it got worse when i had to see other things going on in the app. don’t recommend unless you want it to crash nonstop and glitch.
attributes.title: this app is a fat NO

attributes.review: First it said that I need to be a toddler to eat food. Unbelievable. Then it said that I was going to have to be one of those Karen’s and not wear a mask because it’s unbearable. Unbelievable. Then they said sorry for the glitch, those things aren’t true, then next thing I saw was a picture of a hair in food. EW! Worst app ever
attributes.title: Worst app ever.

attributes.review: This Cheeto app is very nice except it’s totally useless and I don’t know what to do with it! It says Cheeto 2020 on the AppStore, so I got it hoping I could get some discounts on my Cheetos. But when I got it all that showed up was a bunch of pictures of some old guy that looks like my cranky old neighbor😱! What do I do?!
attributes.title: I love cheetos🥰🤩🙊✨ not him tho✨🧞‍♂️🤷‍♀️🤢🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.review: i downloaded the app and immediately threw up. i think it’s something to do with the images of a strange guy with a wee bit orange complexion. i then had to go to the er with horrible cramps and diarrhea. i was diagnosed with diabetes and have since been in the icu. whatever you do don’t get this app this app brings bad karma and horrible poops🤮
attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRENDOUS

attributes.review: This app does not even deserve my 1-star. If I could give it zero stars, I would. I am very disappointed in this app and it is “a danger to our democracy”. Apps like this one should not exist- Ithe design is trash, it’s is bug-infested, and caused my phone to crash and fall into anaphylactic shock. This app should be taken off the App Store!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!

attributes.review:
What the hell🤮 I opened the app to see trump naked smelling his dirty armpits I’m scarred, but next I saw him twerking 
and I nearly passed out, I showed my dad and he’s been in a coma for over a month. My phone has also been dead since trump appeared on the screen. (I’m writing this on X Æ A-Xii’s forhead) but I’ve been going to therapy ever since.
attributes.title: No no no no

attributes.review: I opened this app to see a DIRTY OLD CRUSTY Cheeto puff exercising and then I saw how the cheeto gets its color and the Cheeto was NAKED I am absolutely SCARRED for life. Then fumes from these pictures made me and family PASS OUT!! Please PROTECT people from this and delete this it’s out here HURTING PEOPLE AND OBJECTS!!! My phone has DISAPPEARED into THIN AIR. I’m typing this from a friends phone. Please get rid of this NOW!!
attributes.title: No... just nooo!!!!

attributes.review: it’s a scam... i opened it up and saw a scary cheeto man, i kinda expected that though !!! it’s horrible and not worth it also it’s 17 and up so that’s discrimination also when i downloaded it my phone started acting stupid, siri kept swearing at me and yelling and acting possessed DO NOT GET THIS APP RATE IT 1 STAR, ITS SUCH A SCAM #obama4L
attributes.title: don’t even think about downloading this

attributes.review: this application promotes racist and homophobic rhetoric that is not only damaging and deeply offensive to millions of americans, but promotes a culture of backwardness rather than progression to a bigger and better tomorrow. Donald Trump is a vile human being who has repetitively shown incredibly disgusting behavior towards women, people of color, and the LGBTQ+ community to name a few. Donald Trump is a terrible person.
attributes.title: awful
